name: Mochi Time
description:
Mochi Time is my submission to GDevelop's Weekend Jam #1.

The theme was: "Warioware-Like Minigames" and there was a time-limit of 48 hours.

It's not much, but I did my best. This was my first jam and I'm just happy that I finished. Hope you enjoy it!

Also available at https://liluo.io/jstelly/mochi-time
